alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 7:36PM CDT until April 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Conway County in central Arkansas... West central Faulkner County in central Arkansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 736 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Toad Suck, or 10 miles southwest of Conway, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conway... Menifee... Houston... Toad Suck... Wye Mountain... Bigelow... Fourche... Pleasant Valley in Perry County... Oak Grove in Perry County... New Dixie... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 119 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Arkansas.
